AboutCurrent

About

Beeminder is a goal tracking tool that helps you stay on track towards your goals by charging you a fee when you don’t do your scheduled work towards the goal.

We like to think of it as levying a tax on unproductive behavior on yourself.

You can find out more on our blog, or in the forum. And of course, at Beeminder itself, though that is likely down right now, since you’re visiting the status pages…

If Beeminder is down we will update you about it here. If you think Beeminder is down and there's nothing about it here please alert us by messaging support@beeminder.com or DMing us on the Beeminder forum, or in our Discord.
